headline: L3Harris Expanding Huntsville Solid Rocket Motor Facility, Poised for Further Growth
summary: HUNTSVILLE, Ala., August 04, 2025--L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX) hosted local and state leaders and customers today to showcase its newest Solid Rocket Motor (SRM) production facility known as Advanced Manufacturing Facility – South (AMF-South). The site, the size of more than six football fields, is designed and equipped to support surging production demands and emerging missile defense needs, including President Donald Trump’s Golden Dome.

headline: Palantir Stock Jumps. Earnings Blew Past Wall Street’s Expectations.
summary: Revenue grew 48% year over year, and CEO Alex Karp sees no reason for the company’s growth to relent.

raw.headline: Palantir Stock Jumps. Earnings Blew Past Wall Street’s Expectations.

headline: Palantir’s Earnings Expectations Are Stratospheric—as Always
summary: When  Palantir  Technologies reports its second quarter on Monday afternoon, expectations will be high, as usual, because the company is a rare bird: a growth-stage software business that is also profitable.  Wall Street analysts are expecting sales of $939 million, 39% more than in the same quarter last year.  Free cash flow is expected to be 35% of that, or about $330 million.
